mounts.content:
[general]
host = https://$(PRIMARY_DOMAIN)
max-age = 15m
notify = stdout
gravatar = true
gravatar-url = https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/{}?d=identicon&s=55
latest-enabled = false
[admin]
enabled = true
password = undefined
[moderation]
enabled = false
approve-if-email-previously-approved = false
purge-after = 30d
[guard]
enabled = true
ratelimit = 2
direct-reply = 3
reply-to-self = false
require-author = false
require-email = false
